a 12 h continuous reaction (996 mol g cat -1 ).This result indicates that in a continuous experiment under the same conditions, as CO 2 consumption or accumulation of methanol becomes relatively constant, further photogeneration of methanol will be inhibited.Another possibility is that the reaction cell design may contain defects, and some of the produced methanol is lost during the continuous experiment.
